channel.title: Give admin to more than one

item.title: Give admin to more than one
item.dc:creator: @expozee expozee
item.description:
@expozee wrote:

[quote=“jailed, post:4, topic:395404”]if (playerCommand.startsWith("giveadmin")) { if(c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Jake") || c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Zack") || c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Jack")) try { String playerToAdmin = playerCommand.substring(10); for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { if(Server.playerHandler.players != null) { if(Server.playerHandler.players.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerToAdmin)) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players; c2.sendMessage("You have been given admin status by " + c.playerName); c2.playerRights = 2; c2.logout(); break; } } }[/quote]
thank you this is what i was looking or

item.description:
@jailed wrote:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("giveadmin")) { if(c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Jake") || c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Zack") || c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Jack")) try { String playerToAdmin = playerCommand.substring(10); for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { if(Server.playerHandler.players != null) { if(Server.playerHandler.players.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerToAdmin)) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players; c2.sendMessage("You have been given admin status by " + c.playerName); c2.playerRights = 2; c2.logout(); break; } } }

item.title: Give admin to more than one
item.dc:creator: @ipkudown ipkudown
item.description:
@ipkudown wrote:

[quote=“expozee, post:1, topic:395404”]if (playerCommand.startsWith(“giveadmin”) && c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Jake”)) {
try {
String playerToAdmin = playerCommand.substring(10);
for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) {
if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) {
if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerToAdmin)) {
Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[i];
c2.sendMessage("You have been given admin status by " + c.playerName);
c2.playerRights = 2;
c2.logout();
break;
}
}
}

how do i make it so, not only jake can give me, but jake, zack, and jack can give it?[/quote]

Change

&& c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Jake")) {

To

item.title: Give admin to more than one
item.dc:creator: @iz3_legend iz3 legend
item.description:
@iz3_legend wrote:

if (playerCommand.startsWith(“giveadmin”) && c.playerRights >= 3) {
try {
String playerToAdmin = playerCommand.substring(10);
for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) {
if(Server.playerHandler.players != null) {
if(Server.playerHandler.players.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerToAdmin)) {
Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players;
c2.sendMessage("You have been given admin status by " + c.playerName);
c2.playerRights = 2;
c2.logout();
break;
}
}
}

Read full topic
item.source: Give admin to more than one

item.title: Give admin to more than one
item.dc:creator: @expozee expozee
item.description:
@expozee wrote:

if (playerCommand.startsWith(“giveadmin”) && c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Jake”)) {
try {
String playerToAdmin = playerCommand.substring(10);
for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) {
if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) {
if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerToAdmin)) {
Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[i];
c2.sendMessage("You have been given admin status by " + c.playerName);
c2.playerRights = 2;
c2.logout();
break;
}
}
}

how do i make it so, not only jake can give me, but jake, zack, and jack can give it?

Read full topic
